column5: just decided at the last minute not to drive straight thru all night long to souix lookout on friday june 5. want to stay in fort francis as it seems everything in i. falls is booked. am having a hard time finding names or listings for places in fort francis. does anyone have any names of places, phone numbers etc? thanks, don
La Place Rendez-Vous Hotel Box 696 Fort Francis, Ontario P9A 3N1 Canada (800)544-9435 Pricier than most but is a decent place to stay. They also have a nice restaurant/ bar.
Just stayed at the Rendez-Vous came to about a 100 American per room not bad for as nice as place. Nice bar. Give them a shot you will like it.
Thats the place we always stayed last 10 years. very very nice compared to anything in fort francis. great breakfast too. nice view of the lake if you get oneof those rooms. your wife will love it.
Will jump on the band-wagon. Good motel. A better restuarant/ bar. Last year was the 1st year we did not drive straight through. I will stay there again. Ivy
guys, thanks for all your help but unfortunatly it's full on june 4th.
